long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aspin is an open-source, feature-rich but intuitive passphrase generator designed to help become more secure online. With Aspin, you can create secure and memorable passphrases tailored to your specific needs. 

Key Features:
1. Word Count: Choose the number of words in your passphrase.
2. Number of Passphrases: Generate multiple passphrases at once; ideal for users, who needs several unique passwords for different accounts.
3. Separator Character: Select a character to separate the words.
4. Separator Count: Define the number of times the separator character appears between words.
5. Inclusion of Numbers: Option to append numbers on each word for enhanced complexity
6. Inclusion of Special Characters: Option to append special characters on each word.
7. Word Case Options: Choose the word case of your passphrase (Lowercase, Uppercase, Randomize, or Alternate).
8. Character Substitution: Further enhance security by substituting certain letters with numbers or symbols.

Once you have specified your options, simply click the "Generate" button and copy-paste your new passphrase.
